document.full_text: alex pietrangelo scored at 4:14 of overtime to give canada a 4-3 win over switzerland on tuesday to complete the group stage of the ice hockey world championship with a perfect record.
document.title: canada beats switzerland, 4-3, in overtime at worlds
lines_and_colors: alex pietrangelo scored at 4:14 of overtime to give canada a 4-3 win over switzerland on tuesday to complete the group stage of the ice hockey world championship with a perfect record.
